title: Vision. [No. 24]
creator_credit: Ted Steeg, Tim Strongin, Ted Steeg Productions and United States Information Agency
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Volunteers look after young abandoned eagles; New Pacemaker developed by the John Hopkins Applied Physics Laboratory; a sheep farm family business in Bucks County, Pennsylvania; San Francisco preserves its heritage by retaining its cable cars; an island of peace minutes away from Times Square in New York City; A New York high school has a special class for young rock music composers.
creator_credit_for_label: Ted Steeg, Tim Strongin, Ted Steeg Productions and United States Information Agency
